validate module¶

Validate module contains functions handling validation / verification.

validate.hash_from_line(line)[source]¶

Extract hash string from line of text.

Returns:tuple or None – Tuple in the form: (algorithm index, hash)
validate.set_validator(parent, text)[source]¶

Set and disable the hashChoiceButton.

Does a very fast length check first

Returns:True if valid verifcation string, else False.
